content: Hi all, I also posted a question on https://users.rust-lang.org/t/failure-to-deduce-bound-when-using-const-generics-and-generic-associated-types/55592 but figured I would probably get a faster and more correct answer here. Basically I am trying to figure out if I should expect the snippet to compile once the const_generics feature is completed. I would expect that the trait bound would be auto-deduced since it can be fully evaluated but from the paragraph on the RFC I think it's meant to work this way. Also using parameter deduction for the single statement on the final create function leads to ICE.
clippy currently passes this code though it might add more lints in the future

oliver said:

clippy currently passes this code though it might add more lints in the future

I think it is pretty close, I will do more read up on it. Cheers
